00057 /*****************************************************************************\
00058  * NOTICE OF CONVENTION                                                      *
00059  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
00060  * Mspec links to Pcode, Hcode, and Lcode modules.  In order to allow this   *
00061  * to take place without requiring front-end modules to link to liblcode.a,  *
00062  * Mspec code is divided into two classes as follows:                        *
00063  *  - mi_*.c must not depend on linkage to liblcode.a                        *
00064  *  - ml_*.c may depend on linkage to liblcode.a                             *
00065 \*****************************************************************************/

00078 /*
00079  *      The way this is set up now is the following:
00080  *      If my target is ver1 of impact, i use the functions
00081  *      defined in here, otherwise I call the functions defined
00082  *      in M_hppa.c since I am using HP macros, HP calling convention,
00083  *      HP data layout, HP stack layout, etc.
00084  *
00085  */
00086 
00087 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_VOID        0
00088 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT         1
00089 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_CHAR        8
00090 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_SHORT       16
00091 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT         32
00092 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_LONG        32
00093 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_FLOAT       32
00094 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_DOUBLE      64
00095 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_POINTER     32
00096 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_UNION       -1
00097 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_STRUCT      -1
00098 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BLOCK       -1
00099 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_MAX         64
00100 
00101 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_VOID       -1
00102 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BIT        1
00103 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR       8
00104 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_SHORT      16
00105 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT        32
00106 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_LONG       32
00107 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_FLOAT      32
00108 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_DOUBLE     64
00109 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_POINTER    32
00110 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_UNION      -1      /* depends on the field */
00111 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_STRUCT     -1
00112 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BLOCK      -1
00113 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX        64
00114

00116 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_VOID      0
00117 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT       1
00118 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_CHAR      8
00119 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_SHORT     16
00120 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT       32
00121 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_LONG      32
00122 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_FLOAT     32
00123 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_DOUBLE    64
00124 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_POINTER   32
00125 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_UNION     -1
00126 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_STRUCT    -1
00127 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_BLOCK     -1
00128 #define M_IMPACT_SIZE_MAX       64
00129 
00130 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_VOID     -1
00131 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT      1
00132 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_CHAR     8
00133 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_SHORT    16
00134 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT      32
00135 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_LONG     32
00136 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_FLOAT    32
00137 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_DOUBLE   64
00138 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_POINTER  32
00139 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_UNION    -1      /* depends on the field */
00140 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_STRUCT   -1
00141 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BLOCK    -1
00142 #define M_IMPACT_ALIGN_MAX      64

00145 extern int M_impact_model;

00147 Set Set_impact_fragile_macro = NULL;
00148 
00149 #define M_IMPACT_MAX_FNVAR_REG  4
00150 #define MIN_PARAM_SIZE  (M_IMPACT_MAX_FNVAR_REG * M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT)
00151 
00152 #define M_IMPACT_R0_I           0       /* $P0 */
00153 #define M_IMPACT_R0_F           1       /* $P1 */
00154 #define M_IMPACT_R0_F2          2       /* $P2 */
00155 #define M_IMPACT_ST             0       /* $P0 */
00156 #define M_IMPACT_ARG_I          4
00157 #define M_IMPACT_ARG_F          (M_IMPACT_ARG_I + M_IMPACT_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
00158 #define M_IMPACT_ARG_F2         (M_IMPACT_ARG_F + M_IMPACT_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
00159 
00160 /* Model IMPACT/Lcode after the passing conventions used for HPPA,
00161  * at least initially. -ITI (JCG) 2/99 
00162  */
00163 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG            4
00164 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX         64
00165 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_MIN_PARAM_SIZE           (16 * 8)
00166 
00167 /* incoming and outgoing parameters */
00168 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_INT_BASE         0
00169 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_FLT_BASE         4
00170 
00171 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_I32          15      /* $P15 */
00172 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_I64          15      /* $P15 */
00173 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_ST           15      /* $P15 */
00174 #define M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_F            4       /* $P4  */

00176 /*
00177  *      The following functions are for documentation only.
00178  *      The function overhead is too great for actual usage.
00179  */
00180 void
00181 M_impact_void (M_Type type)
00182 {
00183   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00184     {
00185       type->type = M_TYPE_VOID;
00186       type->unsign = 1;
00187       type->align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_VOID;
00188       type->size = M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_VOID;
00189       type->nbits = 0;
00190     }
00191   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00192     {
00193       type->type = M_TYPE_VOID;
00194       type->unsign = 1;
00195       type->align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_VOID;
00196       type->size = M_IMPACT_SIZE_VOID;
00197       type->nbits = 0;
00198     }
00199   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00200            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00201     {
00202       M_hppa_void (type);
00203     }
00204   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00205            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00206     {
00207       M_sparc_void (type);
00208     }
00209   else
00210     {
00211       M_assert (0, "M_impact_void: illegal machine model");
00212     }
00213 }
00214 
00215 void
00216 M_impact_bit_long (M_Type type, int n)
00217 {
00218   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00219     {
00220       type->type = M_TYPE_BIT_LONG;
00221       type->unsign = 1;
00222       type->align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BIT;
00223       type->size = n * M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT;
00224       type->nbits = n * M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT;
00225       M_assert ((n <= 32),
00226                 "M_bit_long: do not allow bit field of more than 32 bits");
00227     }
00228   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00229     {
00230       type->type = M_TYPE_BIT_LONG;
00231       type->unsign = 0;
00232       type->align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT;
00233       type->size = n * M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00234       type->nbits = n * M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00235       M_assert ((n <= 32),
00236                 "M_bit_long: do not allow bit field of more than 32 bits");
00237     }
00238   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00239            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00240     {
00241       M_hppa_bit_long (type, n);
00242     }
00243   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00244            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00245     {
00246       M_sparc_bit_long (type, n);
00247     }
00248   else
00249     {
00250       M_assert (0, "M_impact_bit_long: illegal machine model");
00251     }
00252 }
00253 
00254 void
00255 M_impact_bit_int (M_Type type, int n)
00256 {
00257   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00258     {
00259       type->type = M_TYPE_BIT_INT;
00260       type->unsign = 1;
00261       type->align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_BIT;
00262       type->size = n * M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT;
00263       type->nbits = n * M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT;
00264       M_assert ((n <= 32),
00265                 "M_bit_int: do not allow bit field of more than 32 bits");
00266     }
00267   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00268     {
00269       type->type = M_TYPE_BIT_INT;
00270       type->unsign = 0;
00271       type->align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT;
00272       type->size = n * M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00273       type->nbits = n * M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00274       M_assert ((n <= 32),
00275                 "M_bit_int: do not allow bit field of more than 32 bits");
00276     }
00277   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00278            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00279     {
00280       M_hppa_bit_int (type, n);
00281     }
00282   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00283            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00284     {
00285       M_sparc_bit_int (type, n);
00286     }
00287   else
00288     {
00289       M_assert (0, "M_impact_bit_int: illegal machine model");
00290     }
00291 }

00293 void
00294 M_impact_bit_short (M_Type type, int n)
00295 {
00296   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)

00298       type->type = M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT;
00299       type->unsign = 1;

00303       M_assert ((n <= 16),
00304                 "M_bit_long: do not allow bit field of more than 16 bits");

00307     {
00308       type->type = M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT;
00309       type->unsign = 0;
00310       type->align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT;
00311       type->size = n * M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00312       type->nbits = n * M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00313       M_assert ((n <= 16),
00314                 "M_bit_long: do not allow bit field of more than 16 bits");
00315     }
00316   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00317            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00318     {
00319       M_hppa_bit_short (type, n);
00320     }
00321   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00322            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00323     {
00324       M_sparc_bit_short (type, n);
00325     }
00326   else
00327     {
00328       M_assert (0, "M_impact_bit_short: illegal machine model");
00329     }

00340       type->size = n * M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT;
00341       type->nbits = n * M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_BIT;
00342       M_assert ((n <= 8),
00343                 "M_bit_char: do not allow bit field of more than 8 bits");
00344     }
00345   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00346     {
00347       type->type = M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR;

00349       type->align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_BIT;
00350       type->size = n * M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;
00351       type->nbits = n * M_IMPACT_SIZE_BIT;

00353                 "M_bit_char: do not allow bit field of more than 8 bits");

00356            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00357     {
00358       M_hppa_bit_char (type, n);
00359     }
00360   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||

00362     {
00363       M_sparc_bit_char (type, n);
00364     }

00371 void
00372 M_impact_float (M_Type type, int unsign)
00373 {
00374   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00375     {
00376       type->type = M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00377       type->unsign = (unsign != 0);
00378       type->align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_FLOAT;
00379       type->size = M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_FLOAT;
00380       type->nbits = M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_FLOAT;
00381     }
00382   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00383     {
00384       type->type = M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00385       type->unsign = (unsign != 0);
00386       type->align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_FLOAT;
00387       type->size = M_IMPACT_SIZE_FLOAT;
00388       type->nbits = M_IMPACT_SIZE_FLOAT;
00389     }
00390   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00391            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00392     {
00393       M_hppa_float (type, unsign);
00394     }
00395   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00396            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00397     {
00398       M_sparc_float (type, unsign);
00399     }
00400   else
00401     {
00402       M_assert (0, "M_impact_float: illegal machine model");
00403     }
00404 }

00407 M_impact_double (M_Type type, int unsign)

00409   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)

00418     {

00453     {
00454       type->type = M_TYPE_POINTER;

00457       type->size = M_IMPACT_SIZE_POINTER;
00458       type->nbits = M_IMPACT_SIZE_POINTER;
00459     }
00460   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00461            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))

00475 
00476 int
00477 M_impact_eval_type (M_Type type, M_Type ntype)
00478 {
00479   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00480     {
00481       switch (type->type)
00482         {
00483         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00484           M_impact_void (ntype);
00485           return -1;            /* can not be evaluated */
00486         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00487         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00488         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00489         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00490         case M_TYPE_INT:
00491         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00492         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00493         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:      /* the starting address of array is used */
00494           M_impact_int (ntype, type->unsign);
00495           return M_TYPE_INT;
00496         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00497           M_impact_float (ntype, type->unsign);
00498           return M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00499         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00500           M_impact_double (ntype, type->unsign);
00501           return M_TYPE_DOUBLE;
00502         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00503         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00504           *ntype = *type;
00505           return type->type;
00506         default:
00507           return (-1);
00508         }
00509     }
00510   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00511     {
00512       switch (type->type)
00513         {
00514         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00515           M_impact_void (ntype);
00516           return -1;            /* can not be evaluated */
00517         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00518         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00519         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00520         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00521         case M_TYPE_INT:
00522         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00523         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00524         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:      /* the starting address of array is used */
00525           M_impact_int (ntype, type->unsign);
00526           return M_TYPE_INT;
00527         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00528           M_impact_float (ntype, type->unsign);
00529           return M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00530         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00531           M_impact_double (ntype, type->unsign);
00532           return M_TYPE_DOUBLE;
00533         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00534         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00535           *ntype = *type;
00536           return type->type;
00537         }
00538     }
00539   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00540            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00541     {
00542       return (M_hppa_eval_type (type, ntype));
00543     }
00544   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00545            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00546     {
00547       return (M_sparc_eval_type (type, ntype));
00548     }
00549   else
00550     {
00551       M_assert (0, "M_impact_eval_type: illegal machine model");
00552     }
00553   return (0);
00554 }
00555 
00556 int
00557 M_impact_eval_type2 (M_Type type, M_Type ntype)
00558 {
00559   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00560     {
00561       switch (type->type)
00562         {
00563         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00564           M_impact_void (ntype);
00565           return -1;            /* can not be evaluated */
00566         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00567         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00568           M_impact_char (ntype, type->unsign);
00569           return M_TYPE_CHAR;
00570         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00571           M_impact_short (ntype, type->unsign);
00572           return M_TYPE_SHORT;
00573         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:      /* the starting address of array is used */
00574         case M_TYPE_INT:
00575           M_impact_int (ntype, type->unsign);
00576           return M_TYPE_INT;
00577         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00578         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00579           M_impact_long (ntype, type->unsign);
00580           return M_TYPE_LONG;
00581         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00582           M_impact_pointer (ntype);
00583           return M_TYPE_POINTER;
00584         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00585           M_impact_float (ntype, type->unsign);
00586           return M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00587         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00588           M_impact_double (ntype, type->unsign);
00589           return M_TYPE_DOUBLE;
00590         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00591         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00592           *ntype = *type;
00593           return type->type;
00594         }
00595     }
00596   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00597     {
00598       switch (type->type)
00599         {
00600         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00601           M_impact_void (ntype);
00602           return -1;            /* can not be evaluated */
00603         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00604         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00605           M_impact_char (ntype, type->unsign);
00606           return M_TYPE_CHAR;
00607         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00608           M_impact_short (ntype, type->unsign);
00609           return M_TYPE_SHORT;
00610         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:      /* the starting address of array is used */
00611         case M_TYPE_INT:
00612           M_impact_int (ntype, type->unsign);
00613           return M_TYPE_INT;
00614         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00615         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00616           M_impact_long (ntype, type->unsign);
00617           return M_TYPE_LONG;
00618         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00619           M_impact_pointer (ntype);
00620           return M_TYPE_POINTER;
00621         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00622           M_impact_float (ntype, type->unsign);
00623           return M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00624         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00625           M_impact_double (ntype, type->unsign);
00626           return M_TYPE_DOUBLE;
00627         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00628         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00629           *ntype = *type;
00630           return type->type;
00631         }
00632     }
00633   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00634            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00635     {
00636       return (M_hppa_eval_type (type, ntype));
00637     }
00638   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00639            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00640     {
00641       return (M_sparc_eval_type (type, ntype));
00642     }
00643   else
00644     {
00645       M_assert (0, "M_impact_eval_type: illegal machine model");
00646     }
00647   return (0);
00648 }
00649 
00650 int
00651 M_impact_call_type (M_Type type, M_Type ntype)
00652 {
00653   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00654     {
00655       switch (type->type)
00656         {
00657         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00658           M_impact_void (ntype);
00659           return -1;            /* can not be evaluated */
00660         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00661         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00662         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00663         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00664         case M_TYPE_INT:
00665         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00666         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00667         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:      /* the starting address of array is used */
00668           M_impact_int (ntype, type->unsign);
00669           return M_TYPE_INT;
00670           /* BCC - don't promote float to double now - 8/5/96 */
00671         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00672           M_impact_float (ntype, type->unsign);
00673           return M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00674         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00675           M_impact_double (ntype, type->unsign);
00676           return M_TYPE_DOUBLE;
00677         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00678         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00679           *ntype = *type;
00680           return type->type;
00681         default:
00682           return (-1);
00683         }
00684     }
00685   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00686     {
00687       switch (type->type)
00688         {
00689         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00690           M_impact_void (ntype);
00691           return -1;            /* can not be evaluated */
00692         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00693         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00694         case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00695         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00696         case M_TYPE_INT:
00697         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00698         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00699         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:      /* the starting address of array is used */
00700           M_impact_int (ntype, type->unsign);
00701           return M_TYPE_INT;
00702           /* BCC - don't promote float to double now - 8/5/96 */
00703         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00704           M_impact_float (ntype, type->unsign);
00705           return M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00706         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00707           M_impact_double (ntype, type->unsign);
00708           return M_TYPE_DOUBLE;
00709         case M_TYPE_UNION:
00710         case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00711           *ntype = *type;
00712           return type->type;
00713         }
00714     }
00715   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00716            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00717     {
00718       return (M_hppa_call_type (type, ntype));
00719     }
00720   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00721            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00722     {
00723       return (M_sparc_call_type (type, ntype));
00724     }
00725   else
00726     {
00727       M_assert (0, "M_impact_call_type: illegal machine model");
00728     }
00729   return (0);
00730 }

00741           return -1;            /* can not be evaluated */
00742         case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00743         case M_TYPE_CHAR:

00745           return M_TYPE_CHAR;
00746         case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00747           M_impact_short (ntype, type->unsign);
00748           return M_TYPE_SHORT;
00749         case M_TYPE_BLOCK:      /* the starting address of array is used */
00750         case M_TYPE_INT:
00751           M_impact_int (ntype, type->unsign);
00752           return M_TYPE_INT;
00753         case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00754         case M_TYPE_LONG:
00755           M_impact_long (ntype, type->unsign);
00756           return M_TYPE_LONG;
00757         case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00758           M_impact_pointer (ntype);
00759           return M_TYPE_POINTER;
00760           /* BCC - don't promote float to double now - 8/5/96 */
00761         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00762           M_impact_float (ntype, type->unsign);
00763           return M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00764         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00765           M_impact_double (ntype, type->unsign);
00766           return M_TYPE_DOUBLE;

00773         }

00775   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00776     {

00778         {
00779         case M_TYPE_VOID:
00780           M_impact_void (ntype);

00783         case M_TYPE_CHAR:

00802           M_impact_float (ntype, type->unsign);
00803           return M_TYPE_FLOAT;
00804         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
