00829 
00830 void
00831 M_impact_array_layout (M_Type type, int *offset)
00832 {
00833   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00834     {
00835       *offset = 0;              /* assume first element is aligned */
00836     }
00837   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00838     {
00839       *offset = 0;              /* assume first element is aligned */
00840     }
00841   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00842            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00843     {
00844       M_hppa_array_layout (type, offset);
00845     }
00846   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00847            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00848     {
00849       M_sparc_array_layout (type, offset);
00850     }
00851   else
00852     {
00853       M_assert (0, "M_impact_array_layout: illegal machine model");
00854     }
00855 }
00856 
00857 int
00858 M_impact_array_align (M_Type type)
00859 {
00860   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00861     {
00862       return type->align;
00863     }
00864   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00865     {
00866       return type->align;
00867     }
00868   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00869            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00870     {
00871       return (M_hppa_array_align (type));
00872     }
00873   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00874            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00875     {
00876       return (M_sparc_array_align (type));
00877     }
00878   else
00879     {
00880       M_assert (0, "M_impact_array_align: illegal machine model");
00881       return (0);
00882     }
00883 }
00884 
00885 int
00886 M_impact_array_size (M_Type type, int dim)
00887 {
00888   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00889     {
00890       int mod, size, align;
00891       size = type->size;
00892       align = type->align;
00893       mod = size % align;
00894       if (mod != 0)
00895         size += (align - mod);
00896       return (size * dim);
00897     }
00898   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00899     {
00900       int mod, size, align;
00901       size = type->size;
00902       align = type->align;
00903       mod = size % align;
00904       if (mod != 0)
00905         size += (align - mod);
00906       return (size * dim);
00907     }
00908   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00909            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00910     {
00911       return (M_hppa_array_size (type, dim));
00912     }
00913   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00914            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00915     {
00916       return (M_sparc_array_size (type, dim));
00917     }
00918   else
00919     {
00920       M_assert (0, "M_impact_array_size: illegal machine model");
00921       return (0);
00922     }
00923 }
00924 
00925 void
00926 M_impact_union_layout (int n, _M_Type * type, int *offset, int *bit_offset)
00927 {
00928   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00929     {
00930       int i;
00931       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00932         {                       /* assume the union is aligned */
00933           offset[i] = 0;
00934           bit_offset[i] = 0;
00935         }
00936     }
00937   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00938     {
00939       int i;
00940       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00941         {                       /* assume the union is aligned */
00942           offset[i] = 0;
00943           bit_offset[i] = 0;
00944         }
00945     }
00946   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
00947            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
00948     {
00949       M_hppa_union_layout (n, type, offset, bit_offset);
00950     }
00951   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
00952            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
00953     {
00954       M_sparc_union_layout (n, type, offset, bit_offset);
00955     }
00956   else
00957     {
00958       M_assert (0, "M_impact_union_layout: illegal machine model");
00959     }
00960 }
00961 
00962 int
00963 M_impact_union_align (int n, _M_Type * type)
00964 {
00965   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
00966     {
00967       int i, max;
00968       max = 0;
00969       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00970         {
00971           int aln = type[i].align;
00972           if (aln > max)
00973             max = aln;
00974         }
00975       /*
00976        *  align to at least byte boundary.
00977        */
00978       if (max < M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR)
00979         max = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR;
00980       return max;
00981     }
00982   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
00983     {
00984       int i, max;
00985       max = 0;
00986       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00987         {
00988           int aln = type[i].align;
00989           if (aln > max)
00990             max = aln;
00991         }
00992       /*
00993        *  align to at least integer boundary.
00994        */
00995       if (max < M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT)
00996         max = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
00997       return max;
00998     }
00999   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
01000            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
01001     {
01002       return (M_hppa_union_align (n, type));
01003     }
01004   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
01005            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
01006     {
01007       return (M_sparc_union_align (n, type));
01008     }
01009   else
01010     {
01011       M_assert (0, "M_impact_union_align: illegal machine model");
01012       return (0);
01013     }
01014 }
01015 
01016 int
01017 M_impact_union_size (int n, _M_Type * type)
01018 {
01019   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
01020     {
01021       int i, aln, max_size, max_align;
01022       max_size = 0;
01023       max_align = 0;
01024       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01025         {
01026           int size;
01027           size = type[i].size;
01028           if (size > max_size)
01029             max_size = size;
01030           aln = type[i].align;
01031           if (aln > max_align)
01032             max_align = aln;
01033         }
01034       /*
01035        *  align to at least byte boundary.
01036        */
01037       if (max_align < M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR)
01038         max_align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR;
01039       /* need to increment to the max. align for future array extension */
01040       i = max_size % max_align;
01041       if (i != 0)
01042         max_size += (max_align - i);
01043       return max_size;
01044     }
01045   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
01046     {
01047       int i, aln, max_size, max_align;
01048       max_size = 0;
01049       max_align = 0;
01050       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01051         {
01052           int size;
01053           size = type[i].size;
01054           if (size > max_size)
01055             max_size = size;
01056           aln = type[i].align;
01057           if (aln > max_align)
01058             max_align = aln;
01059         }
01060       /*
01061        *  align to at least integer boundary.
01062        */
01063       if (max_align < M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT)
01064         max_align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
01065       /* need to increment to the max. align for future array extension */
01066       i = max_size % max_align;
01067       if (i != 0)
01068         max_size += (max_align - i);
01069       return max_size;
01070     }
01071   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
01072            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
01073     {
01074       return (M_hppa_union_size (n, type));
01075     }
01076   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
01077            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
01078     {
01079       return (M_sparc_union_size (n, type));
01080     }
01081   else
01082     {
01083       M_assert (0, "M_impact_union_size: illegal machine model");
01084       return (0);
01085     }
01086 }
01087 
01088 void
01089 M_impact_struct_layout (int n, _M_Type * type, int *base, int *bit_offset)
01090 {
01091   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
01092     {
01093       int i, offset;
01094       int mod, size, align, mod_word, mod_type;
01095 
01096       offset = 0;               /* assume initially aligned */
01097       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01098         {
01099           size = type[i].size;
01100           align = type[i].align;
01101           M_assert ((size != 0) && (align != 0),
01102                     "M_struct_layout: void is not allowed in structure");
01103           /*
01104            *  need to treat bit fields specially.
01105            *  keep them in a word when possible.
01106            */
01107           mod_word = offset % M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT;
01108           if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR)
01109             {
01110               if ((mod_word + size) > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT)
01111                 offset += (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod_word);
01112               else
01113                 {
01114                   mod_type = offset % M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_CHAR;
01115                   if ((mod_type + size) > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_CHAR)
01116                     {
01117                       type[i].type = M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT;
01118                     }
01119                 }
01120             }
01121           if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT)
01122             {
01123               if ((mod_word + size) > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT)
01124                 offset += (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod_word);
01125               else
01126                 {
01127                   mod_type = offset % M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_SHORT;
01128                   if ((mod_type + size) > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_SHORT)
01129                     {
01130                       type[i].type = M_TYPE_BIT_LONG;
01131                     }
01132                 }
01133             }
01134           else if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
01135             {
01136               if ((mod_word + size) > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT)
01137                 offset += (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod_word);
01138             }
01139           mod = offset % align; /* align to what the field */
01140           if (mod != 0)         /* needs to start from */
01141             offset += (align - mod);
01142 
01143           if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR)
01144             {
01145               int mod = offset % M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT;
01146 
01147               bit_offset[i] = offset - mod +
01148                 (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod - size);
01149               base[i] = offset & (~(M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_CHAR - 1));
01150             }
01151           else if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT)
01152             {
01153               int mod = offset % M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT;
01154 
01155               bit_offset[i] = offset - mod +
01156                 (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod - size);
01157               base[i] = offset & (~(M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_SHORT - 1));
01158 
01159             }
01160           else if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
01161             {
01162               int mod = offset % M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT;
01163 
01164               bit_offset[i] = offset - mod +
01165                 (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod - size);
01166               base[i] = offset & (~(M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_LONG - 1));
01167             }
01168           else
01169             {
01170               base[i] = offset;
01171               bit_offset[i] = 0;
01172             }
01173 
01174           offset += size;       /* allocate space */
01175         }
01176     }
01177   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
01178     {
01179       int i, offset;
01180       int mod, size, align;
01181       offset = 0;               /* assume initially aligned */
01182       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01183         {
01184           size = type[i].size;
01185           align = type[i].align;
01186           M_assert ((size != 0) && (align != 0),
01187                     "M_struct_layout: void is not allowed in structure");
01188           /*
01189            *  need to treat bit fields specially.
01190            *  keep them in a word when possible.
01191            */
01192           if ((i != 0) && (type[i].type != M_TYPE_BIT_LONG) &&
01193               (type[i].type != M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR))
01194             {
01195               if (type[i - 1].type == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
01196                 {
01197                   mod = offset % M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
01198                   if (mod != 0)
01199                     offset += (M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT - mod);
01200                 }
01201               else if (type[i - 1].type == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR)
01202                 {
01203                   mod = offset % M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
01204                   if (mod != 0)
01205                     offset += (M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT - mod);
01206                 }
01207             }
01208           if ((type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG) ||
01209               (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR))
01210             {
01211               int mod1;
01212               mod1 = offset % M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT;
01213               if ((mod1 + size) > M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT)
01214                 {
01215                   /* need to go to the next word */
01216                   offset += (M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT - mod1);
01217                 }
01218             }
01219           mod = offset % align; /* align to what the field */
01220           if (mod != 0)         /* needs to start from */
01221             offset += (align - mod);
01222           base[i] = offset;
01223           if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
01224             {
01225               bit_offset[i] = offset % M_IMPACT_SIZE_LONG;
01226             }
01227           else if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR)
01228             {
01229               bit_offset[i] = offset % M_IMPACT_SIZE_CHAR;
01230             }
01231           else
01232             {
01233               bit_offset[i] = 0;
01234             }
01235           offset += size;       /* allocate space */
01236         }
01237     }
01238   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
01239            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
01240     {
01241       M_hppa_struct_layout (n, type, base, bit_offset);
01242     }
01243   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
01244            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
01245     {
01246       M_sparc_struct_layout (n, type, base, bit_offset);
01247     }
01248   else
01249     {
01250       M_assert (0, "M_impact_struct_layout: illegal machine model");
01251     }
01252 }
01253 
01254 int
01255 M_impact_struct_align (int n, _M_Type * type)
01256 {
01257   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
01258     {
01259       int i, max;
01260       max = 0;
01261       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01262         {
01263           int aln = type[i].align;
01264           if (aln > max)
01265             max = aln;
01266         }
01267       /*
01268        *  align to at least byte boundary.
01269        */
01270       if (max < M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR)
01271         max = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR;
01272       return max;
01273     }
01274   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
01275     {
01276       int i, max;
01277       max = 0;
01278       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01279         {
01280           int aln = type[i].align;
01281           if (aln > max)
01282             max = aln;
01283         }
01284       /*
01285        *  align to at least integer boundary.
01286        */
01287       if (max < M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT)
01288         max = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
01289       return max;
01290     }
01291   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
01292            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
01293     {
01294       return (M_hppa_struct_align (n, type));
01295     }
01296   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
01297            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
01298     {
01299       return (M_sparc_struct_align (n, type));
01300     }
01301   else
01302     {
01303       M_assert (0, "M_impact_struct_align: illegal machine model");
01304       return (0);
01305     }
01306 }
01307 
01308 int
01309 M_impact_struct_size (int n, _M_Type * type, int struct_align)
01310 {
01311   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
01312     {
01313       int i, offset;
01314       int mod, size, align, max_align, mod_word;
01315       offset = 0;               /* assume initially aligned */
01316       max_align = struct_align;
01317       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01318         {
01319           size = type[i].size;
01320           align = type[i].align;
01321           M_assert ((size != 0) && (align != 0),
01322                     "M_struct_layout: void is not allowed in structure");
01323           if (align > max_align)
01324             max_align = align;
01325           /*
01326            *  need to treat bit fields specially.
01327            *  keep them in a word when possible.
01328            */
01329           mod_word = offset % M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT;
01330           if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR)
01331             {
01332               if ((mod_word + size) > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT)
01333                 offset += (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod_word);
01334               if (M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR > max_align)
01335                 max_align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR;
01336             }
01337           else if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT)
01338             {
01339               if ((mod_word + size) > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT)
01340                 offset += (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod_word);
01341               if (M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_SHORT > max_align)
01342                 max_align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_SHORT;
01343             }
01344           else if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
01345             {
01346               if ((mod_word + size) > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT)
01347                 offset += (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT - mod_word);
01348               if (M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_LONG > max_align)
01349                 max_align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_LONG;
01350             }
01351           mod = offset % align; /* align to what the field */
01352           if (mod != 0)         /* needs to start from */
01353             offset += (align - mod);
01354 
01355           offset += size;
01356         }
01357       /*
01358        * align to at least byte boundary.
01359        */
01360       if (max_align < M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR)
01361         max_align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_CHAR;
01362       /* enforce max. alignment */
01363       mod = offset % max_align;
01364       if (mod != 0)
01365         offset += (max_align - mod);
01366       return offset;
01367     }
01368   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
01369     {
01370       int i, offset;
01371       int mod, size, align, max_align;
01372       offset = 0;               /* assume initially aligned */
01373       max_align = 0;
01374       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01375         {
01376           size = type[i].size;
01377           align = type[i].align;
01378           M_assert ((size != 0) && (align != 0),
01379                     "M_struct_layout: void is not allowed in structure");
01380           if (align > max_align)
01381             max_align = align;
01382           /*
01383            *  need to treat bit fields specially.
01384            *  keep them in a word when possible.
01385            */
01386           if ((i != 0) && (type[i].type != M_TYPE_BIT_LONG) &&
01387               (type[i].type != M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR))
01388             {
01389               if (type[i - 1].type == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
01390                 {
01391                   mod = offset % M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
01392                   if (mod != 0)
01393                     offset += (M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT - mod);
01394                 }
01395               else if (type[i - 1].type == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR)
01396                 {
01397                   mod = offset % M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
01398                   if (mod != 0)
01399                     offset += (M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT - mod);
01400                 }
01401             }
01402           if ((type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
01403               || (type[i].type == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR))
01404             {
01405               int mod1;
01406               mod1 = offset % M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT;
01407               if ((mod1 + size) > M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT)
01408                 {
01409                   /* need to go to the next word */
01410                   offset += (M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT - mod1);
01411                 }
01412             }
01413           mod = offset % align;
01414           if (mod != 0)
01415             offset += (align - mod);
01416           offset += size;
01417         }
01418       /*
01419        *  align to at least integer boundary.
01420        */
01421       if (max_align < M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT)
01422         max_align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_INT;
01423       /* enforce max. alignment */
01424       mod = offset % max_align;
01425       if (mod != 0)
01426         offset += (max_align - mod);
01427       return offset;
01428     }
01429   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
01430            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
01431     {
01432       return (M_hppa_struct_size (n, type, struct_align));
01433     }
01434   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
01435            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
01436     {
01437       return (M_sparc_struct_size (n, type, struct_align));
01438     }
01439   else
01440     {
01441       M_assert (0, "M_impact_struct_size: illegal machine model");
01442       return (0);
01443     }
01444 }
01445 
01446 int
01447 M_impact_layout_fnvar (List param_list, char **base_macro,
01448                        int *pcount, int purpose)
01449 {
01450   M_Param param;
01451 
01452   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
01453     {
01454       int max_align, off;
01455       int int_rg;
01456       int fp_rg;
01457       int size, align, mod, tp;
01458 
01459 
01460       switch (purpose)
01461         {
01462         case M_GET_FNVAR:
01463           *base_macro = "$IP";
01464           break;
01465         case M_PUT_FNVAR:
01466           *base_macro = "$OP";
01467           break;
01468         case M_DONT_CARE_FNVAR:
01469         default:
01470           M_assert (0, "M_fnvar_layout: unknown purpose");
01471         }
01472 
01473       max_align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX;
01474       fp_rg = 0;
01475       int_rg = 0;
01476       off = 0;
01477 
01478       List_start (param_list);
01479       while ((param = (M_Param)List_next (param_list)))
01480         {
01481           tp = param->mtype.type;
01482 
01483           switch (tp)
01484             {
01485             case M_TYPE_CHAR:
01486             case M_TYPE_SHORT:
01487             case M_TYPE_INT:
01488             case M_TYPE_LONG:
01489             case M_TYPE_POINTER:
01490               if (int_rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01491                 {
01492                   param->mode = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01493                   param->reg = (int_rg)++ + M_IMPACT_LCODE_INT_BASE;
01494                 }
01495               else
01496                 {
01497                   param->mode = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01498                   param->reg = -1;
01499                 }
01500               break;
01501 
01502             case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
01503               if (int_rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01504                 {
01505                   param->mode = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01506                   param->reg = (fp_rg) + 1 + M_IMPACT_LCODE_FLT_BASE;
01507                   int_rg += 1;
01508                   fp_rg  += 1;
01509                 }
01510               else
01511                 {
01512                   param->mode = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01513                   param->reg = -1;
01514                 }
01515               break;
01516 
01517             case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
01518               if (int_rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01519                 {
01520                   param->mode = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01521                   param->reg = fp_rg + 1 + M_IMPACT_LCODE_FLT_BASE;
01522                   int_rg += 2;
01523                   fp_rg  += 1;
01524                 }
01525               else
01526                 {
01527                   param->mode = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01528                   param->reg = -1;
01529                 }
01530               break;
01531 
01532             case M_TYPE_UNION:
01533             case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
01534               size = param->mtype.size;
01535               if (int_rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01536                 {
01537                   param->mode = M_INDIRECT_THRU_REGISTER;
01538                   param->reg = (int_rg)++ + M_IMPACT_LCODE_INT_BASE;
01539                 }
01540               else
01541                 {
01542                   if (size <= M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX)
01543                     param->mode = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01544                   else
01545                     param->mode = M_INDIRECT_THRU_MEMORY;
01546                   param->reg = -1;
01547                 }
01548               break;
01549             default:
01550               M_assert (0, "M_fnvar_layout: argument is not promoted");
01551             }
01552           /* note, the method of calculating offsets may seem strange, but */
01553           /* the PA convention has the stack growing towards high memory   */
01554           /* and the parameters are referenced back from the $sp, with the */
01555           /* first parameter being closest to the stack pointer            */
01556           size = param->mtype.size;
01557           align = param->mtype.align;
01558 
01559           if (param->mtype.type == M_TYPE_UNION || 
01560               param->mtype.type == M_TYPE_STRUCT)
01561             {
01562               /* make sure correct size and alignment is used for 
01563                * struct/union passed indirectly thru registers
01564                * if IMPACT allowed structures to be passed via registers, 
01565                * this would not have to be done                           
01566                */
01567               if (param->mode == M_INDIRECT_THRU_REGISTER)
01568                 {
01569                   size = M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT;
01570                   align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT;
01571                 }
01572             }
01573           if (align >= M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX &&
01574               param->mtype.type != M_TYPE_DOUBLE)
01575             /* anything larger than a 64-bit structure is passed */
01576             /* indirectly thru memory                            */
01577             align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT;
01578           else if (align < M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT)
01579             /* anything smaller that 32-bits is passed as 32-bits */
01580             align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT;
01581 
01582           mod = off % align;
01583 
01584           /* place the offset pointer to the boundary of the appropriate */
01585           /* data size                                                   */
01586           if (mod != 0)
01587             off += (align - mod);
01588 
01589 #ifndef JWS_NEW_STACK_MODEL
01590           /* now increment the offset to point to the actual location    */
01591           /* for this parameter                                          */
01592           off += size;
01593           param->offset = -off;
01594 #else
01595           param->offset = off;
01596           off += size;
01597 #endif
01598         }
01599 
01600 
01601       /* The param section must be at least certain size.
01602        * This is the backing store for the parameter regs. */
01603       if (off < MIN_PARAM_SIZE)
01604         off = MIN_PARAM_SIZE;
01605 
01606       /* now for the body of the structures... small ones first. */
01607 
01608       List_start (param_list);
01609       while ((param = (M_Param)List_next (param_list)))
01610         {
01611           tp = param->mtype.type;
01612           size = param->mtype.size;
01613 
01614           if (((tp == M_TYPE_UNION) ||
01615                (tp == M_TYPE_STRUCT)) &&
01616               (size <= M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX))
01617             {
01618 
01619               /* must align to a double boundry */
01620               align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX;
01621 
01622               mod = off % align;
01623 
01624               if (mod != 0)
01625                 off += (align - mod);
01626 
01627 #ifndef JWS_NEW_STACK_MODEL
01628               off += size;
01629               param->paddr = -off;
01630 #else
01631               param->paddr = off;
01632               off += size;
01633 #endif
01634             }
01635         }
01636       /* now large ones */
01637       List_start (param_list);
01638       while ((param = (M_Param)List_next (param_list)))
01639         {
01640           tp = param->mtype.type;
01641 
01642           size = param->mtype.size;
01643 
01644           if (((tp == M_TYPE_UNION) ||
01645                (tp == M_TYPE_STRUCT)) &&
01646               (size > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX))
01647             {
01648 
01649               /* must align to a double boundry */
01650               align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX;
01651 
01652               mod = off % align;
01653 
01654               if (mod != 0)
01655                 off += (align - mod);
01656 #ifndef JWS_NEW_STACK_MODEL
01657               off += size;
01658               param->paddr = -off;
01659 #else
01660               param->paddr = off;
01661               off += size;
01662 #endif
01663             }
01664         }
01665 
01666       *pcount = int_rg;
01667       return off;               /* the total size needed */
01668     }
01669   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
01670     {
01671       int max_align, off, rg;
01672       int size, align, mod, tp;
01673       /*
01674        *  Formal parameters are specified relative to $FP or $SP.
01675        */
01676       if (purpose == M_GET_FNVAR)
01677         {
01678           /* should be $_arg (for IMPACT, $_arg = $FP) */
01679           *base_macro = "$FP";  /* incoming arguments */
01680         }
01681       else if (purpose == M_PUT_FNVAR)
01682         {
01683           /* should be $_param (for IMPACT, $_param = $SP) */
01684           *base_macro = "$SP";  /* outgoing arguments */
01685         }
01686       else
01687         {
01688           /* the caller does not need the base_macro */
01689           *base_macro = "???";
01690           M_assert (0, "M_fnvar_layout: unknown purpose");
01691         }
01692       /* 
01693        *  the PARAM section must be max. aligned initially 
01694        */
01695       max_align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_MAX;
01696       /*
01697        *  pass the first M_IMPACT_MAX_FNVAR_REG 
01698        *  scalar variables thru registers.
01699        */
01700       rg = 0;
01701       off = 0;
01702       List_start (param_list);
01703       while ((param = (M_Param)List_next (param_list)))
01704         {
01705           tp = param->mtype.type;
01706           switch (tp)
01707             {
01708             case M_TYPE_INT:
01709             case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
01710               if (rg < M_IMPACT_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01711                 {
01712                   param->mode = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01713                   switch (tp)
01714                     {
01715                     case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
01716                       param->reg = M_IMPACT_ARG_F + rg;
01717                       break;
01718                     case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
01719                       param->reg = M_IMPACT_ARG_F2 + rg;
01720                       break;
01721                     default:
01722                       param->reg = M_IMPACT_ARG_I + rg;
01723                       break;
01724                     }
01725                   rg++;
01726                 }
01727               else
01728                 {
01729                   param->mode = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01730                   param->reg = -1;
01731                 }
01732               break;
01733             case M_TYPE_UNION:
01734             case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
01735               param->mode = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01736               param->reg = -1;
01737               break;
01738             default:
01739               M_assert (0, "M_fnvar_layout: argument is not promoted");
01740             }
01741           size = param->mtype.size;
01742           align = param->mtype.align;
01743           mod = off % align;
01744           if (mod != 0)
01745             off += (align - mod);
01746           param->offset = off;
01747           off += size;
01748         }
01749       /* the param section must be at least certain size */
01750       if (off < MIN_PARAM_SIZE)
01751         off = MIN_PARAM_SIZE;
01752       /* the param section must be max. aligned */
01753       mod = off % max_align;
01754       if (mod != 0)
01755         off += (max_align - mod);
01756       *pcount = rg;
01757       return off;               /* the total size needed */
01758     }
01759   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
01760            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
01761     {
01762       return M_hppa_layout_fnvar (param_list, base_macro, pcount, purpose);
01763     }
01764   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
01765            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
01766     {
01767       return M_sparc_layout_fnvar (param_list, base_macro, pcount, purpose);
01768     }
01769   else
01770     {
01771       M_assert (0, "M_impact_fnvar_layout: illegal machine model");
01772       return (0);
01773     }
01774 }
01775 
01776 int
01777 M_impact_fnvar_layout (int n, _M_Type * type, long int *offset, int *mode,
01778                        int *reg, int *paddr, char **base_macro,
01779                        int *su_sreg, int *su_ereg,
01780                        int *pcount, int need_ST, int purpose)
01781                                       /* need to return structure */
01782 {
01783   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
01784     {
01785       int i, max_align, off;
01786       int int_rg;
01787       int fp_rg;
01788       int size, align, mod, tp;
01789 
01790 
01791       switch (purpose)
01792         {
01793         case M_GET_FNVAR:
01794           *base_macro = "$IP";
01795           break;
01796         case M_PUT_FNVAR:
01797           *base_macro = "$OP";
01798           break;
01799         case M_DONT_CARE_FNVAR:
01800         default:
01801           M_assert (0, "M_fnvar_layout: unknown purpose");
01802         }
01803 
01804       max_align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX;
01805       fp_rg = 0;
01806       int_rg = 0;
01807       off = 0;
01808 
01809       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01810         {
01811           tp = type[i].type;
01812           switch (tp)
01813             {
01814             case M_TYPE_CHAR:
01815             case M_TYPE_SHORT:
01816             case M_TYPE_INT:
01817             case M_TYPE_LONG:
01818             case M_TYPE_POINTER:
01819               if (int_rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01820                 {
01821                   mode[i] = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01822                   reg[i] = (int_rg)++ + M_IMPACT_LCODE_INT_BASE;
01823                 }
01824               else
01825                 {
01826                   mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01827                   reg[i] = -1;
01828                 }
01829               break;
01830 
01831             case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
01832               if (int_rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01833                 {
01834                   mode[i] = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01835                   reg[i] = (fp_rg) + 1 + M_IMPACT_LCODE_FLT_BASE;
01836                   int_rg += 1;
01837                   fp_rg  += 1;
01838                 }
01839               else
01840                 {
01841                   mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01842                   reg[i] = -1;
01843                 }
01844               break;
01845 
01846             case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
01847               if (int_rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01848                 {
01849                   mode[i] = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01850                   reg[i] = fp_rg + 1 + M_IMPACT_LCODE_FLT_BASE;
01851                   int_rg += 2;
01852                   fp_rg  += 1;
01853 #if 0
01854                   if (rg == 0 || rg == 2)
01855                     {
01856                       mode[i] = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01857                       reg[i] = rg + 1 + M_IMPACT_LCODE_FLT_BASE;
01858                       rg += 2;
01859                     }
01860                   else if (rg == 1)
01861                     {
01862                       mode[i] = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01863                       reg[i] = 3 + M_IMPACT_LCODE_FLT_BASE;
01864                       rg += 3;
01865                     }
01866                   else
01867                     {
01868                       mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01869                       reg[i] = -1;
01870                     }
01871 #endif
01872                 }
01873               else
01874                 {
01875                   mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01876                   reg[i] = -1;
01877                 }
01878               break;
01879 
01880             case M_TYPE_UNION:
01881             case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
01882               size = type[i].size;
01883               if (int_rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01884                 {
01885                   mode[i] = M_INDIRECT_THRU_REGISTER;
01886                   reg[i] = (int_rg)++ + M_IMPACT_LCODE_INT_BASE;
01887                 }
01888               else
01889                 {
01890                   if (size <= M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX)
01891                     mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01892                   else
01893                     mode[i] = M_INDIRECT_THRU_MEMORY;
01894                   reg[i] = -1;
01895                 }
01896               break;
01897 
01898 #if 0
01899               /* IMPACT does not allow passing of structures via registers,
01900                * therefore where structures are concerned, HP's calling 
01901                * convention is ignored   
01902                */
01903               size = type[i].size;
01904               if (size <= M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT)
01905                 {
01906                   if (rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01907                     {
01908                       mode[i] = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01909                       reg[i] = (rg)++ + M_IMPACT_LCODE_INT_BASE;
01910                     }
01911                   else
01912                     {
01913                       mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01914                       reg[i] = -1;
01915                     }
01916                 }
01917               else if (size <= M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX)
01918                 {
01919                   if ((rg == 0) || (rg == 2))
01920                     {
01921                       mode[i] = M_THRU_REGISTER;
01922                       reg[i] = rg + M_IMPACT_LCODE_INT_BASE;
01923                       rg += 2;
01924                     }
01925                   else
01926                     {
01927                       mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
01928                       reg[i] = -1;
01929                     }
01930                 }
01931               else
01932                 {
01933                   if (rg < M_IMPACT_LCODE_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
01934                     {
01935                       mode[i] = M_INDIRECT_THRU_REGISTER;
01936                       reg[i] = (rg)++ + M_IMPACT_LCODE_INT_BASE;
01937                     }
01938                   else
01939                     {
01940                       mode[i] = M_INDIRECT_THRU_MEMORY;
01941                       reg[i] = -1;
01942                     }
01943                 }
01944               break;
01945 #endif
01946             default:
01947               M_assert (0, "M_fnvar_layout: argument is not promoted");
01948             }
01949           /* note, the method of calculating offsets may seem strange, but */
01950           /* the PA convention has the stack growing towards high memory   */
01951           /* and the parameters are referenced back from the $sp, with the */
01952           /* first parameter being closest to the stack pointer            */
01953           size = type[i].size;
01954           align = type[i].align;
01955 
01956           if (type[i].type == M_TYPE_UNION || type[i].type == M_TYPE_STRUCT)
01957             {
01958               /* make sure correct size and alignment is used for 
01959                * struct/union passed indirectly thru registers
01960                * if IMPACT allowed structures to be passed via registers, 
01961                * this would not have to be done                           
01962                */
01963               if (mode[i] == M_INDIRECT_THRU_REGISTER)
01964                 {
01965                   size = M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT;
01966                   align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT;
01967                 }
01968             }
01969           if (align >= M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX &&
01970               type[i].type != M_TYPE_DOUBLE)
01971             /* anything larger than a 64-bit structure is passed */
01972             /* indirectly thru memory                            */
01973             align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT;
01974           else if (align < M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT)
01975             /* anything smaller that 32-bits is passed as 32-bits */
01976             align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_INT;
01977 
01978           mod = off % align;
01979 
01980           /* place the offset pointer to the boundary of the appropriate */
01981           /* data size                                                   */
01982           if (mod != 0)
01983             off += (align - mod);
01984 
01985 #ifndef JWS_NEW_STACK_MODEL
01986           /* now increment the offset to point to the actual location    */
01987           /* for this parameter                                          */
01988           off += size;
01989           offset[i] = -off;
01990 #else
01991           offset[i] = off;
01992           off += size;
01993 #endif
01994         }
01995 
01996 
01997       /* The param section must be at least certain size.
01998        * This is the backing store for the parameter regs. */
01999       if (off < MIN_PARAM_SIZE)
02000         off = MIN_PARAM_SIZE;
02001 
02002       /* now for the body of the structures... small ones first. */
02003       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
02004         {
02005           tp = type[i].type;
02006 
02007           size = type[i].size;
02008 
02009           if (((tp == M_TYPE_UNION) ||
02010                (tp == M_TYPE_STRUCT)) &&
02011               (size <= M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX))
02012             {
02013 
02014               /* must align to a double boundry */
02015               align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX;
02016 
02017               mod = off % align;
02018 
02019               if (mod != 0)
02020                 off += (align - mod);
02021 
02022 #ifndef JWS_NEW_STACK_MODEL
02023               off += size;
02024               paddr[i] = -off;
02025 #else
02026               paddr[i] = off;
02027               off += size;
02028 #endif
02029             }
02030         }
02031       /* now large ones */
02032       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
02033         {
02034           tp = type[i].type;
02035 
02036           size = type[i].size;
02037 
02038           if (((tp == M_TYPE_UNION) ||
02039                (tp == M_TYPE_STRUCT)) &&
02040               (size > M_IMPACT_LCODE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX))
02041             {
02042 
02043               /* must align to a double boundry */
02044               align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX;
02045 
02046               mod = off % align;
02047 
02048               if (mod != 0)
02049                 off += (align - mod);
02050 #ifndef JWS_NEW_STACK_MODEL
02051               off += size;
02052               paddr[i] = -off;
02053 #else
02054               paddr[i] = off;
02055               off += size;
02056 #endif
02057             }
02058         }
02059 
02060       *pcount = int_rg;
02061       return off;               /* the total size needed */
02062     }
02063   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02064     {
02065       int i, max_align, off, rg;
02066       int size, align, mod, tp;
02067       /*
02068        *  Formal parameters are specified relative to $FP or $SP.
02069        */
02070       if (purpose == M_GET_FNVAR)
02071         {
02072           /* should be $_arg (for IMPACT, $_arg = $FP) */
02073           *base_macro = "$FP";  /* incoming arguments */
02074         }
02075       else if (purpose == M_PUT_FNVAR)
02076         {
02077           /* should be $_param (for IMPACT, $_param = $SP) */
02078           *base_macro = "$SP";  /* outgoing arguments */
02079         }
02080       else
02081         {
02082           /* the caller does not need the base_macro */
02083           *base_macro = "???";
02084           M_assert (0, "M_fnvar_layout: unknown purpose");
02085         }
02086       /* 
02087        *  the PARAM section must be max. aligned initially 
02088        */
02089       max_align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_MAX;
02090       /*
02091        *  pass the first M_IMPACT_MAX_FNVAR_REG 
02092        *  scalar variables thru registers.
02093        */
02094       rg = 0;
02095       off = 0;
02096       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
02097         {
02098           tp = type[i].type;
02099           switch (tp)
02100             {
02101             case M_TYPE_INT:
02102             case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
02103               if (rg < M_IMPACT_MAX_FNVAR_REG)
02104                 {
02105                   mode[i] = M_THRU_REGISTER;
02106                   switch (tp)
02107                     {
02108                     case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
02109                       reg[i] = M_IMPACT_ARG_F + rg;
02110                       break;
02111                     case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
02112                       reg[i] = M_IMPACT_ARG_F2 + rg;
02113                       break;
02114                     default:
02115                       reg[i] = M_IMPACT_ARG_I + rg;
02116                       break;
02117                     }
02118                   rg++;
02119                 }
02120               else
02121                 {
02122                   mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
02123                   reg[i] = -1;
02124                 }
02125               break;
02126             case M_TYPE_UNION:
02127             case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
02128               mode[i] = M_THRU_MEMORY;
02129               reg[i] = -1;
02130               break;
02131             default:
02132               M_assert (0, "M_fnvar_layout: argument is not promoted");
02133             }
02134           size = type[i].size;
02135           align = type[i].align;
02136           mod = off % align;
02137           if (mod != 0)
02138             off += (align - mod);
02139           offset[i] = off;
02140           off += size;
02141         }
02142       /* the param section must be at least certain size */
02143       if (off < MIN_PARAM_SIZE)
02144         off = MIN_PARAM_SIZE;
02145       /* the param section must be max. aligned */
02146       mod = off % max_align;
02147       if (mod != 0)
02148         off += (max_align - mod);
02149       *pcount = rg;
02150       return off;               /* the total size needed */
02151     }
02152   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02153            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02154     {
02155       return (M_hppa_fnvar_layout (n, type, offset, mode, reg, paddr,
02156                                    base_macro, su_sreg, su_ereg, pcount,
02157                                    need_ST, purpose));
02158     }
02159   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02160            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02161     {
02162       return (M_sparc_fnvar_layout (n, type, offset, mode, reg, paddr,
02163                                     base_macro, su_sreg, su_ereg, pcount,
02164                                     need_ST, purpose));
02165     }
02166   else
02167     {
02168       M_assert (0, "M_impact_fnvar_layout: illegal machine model");
02169       return (0);
02170     }
02171 }
02172 
02173 int
02174 M_impact_lvar_layout (int n, _M_Type * type, long int *offset,
02175                       char **base_macro)
02176 {
02177   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02178     {
02179       int i, max_align, off;
02180       int size, align, mod, tp;
02181       /*
02182        *  the LOCAL section must be max. aligned initially
02183        */
02184       max_align = M_IMPACT_LCODE_ALIGN_MAX;
02185       off = 0;
02186       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
02187         {
02188           tp = type[i].type;
02189           if (tp == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
02190             {
02191               M_assert (0, "M_lvar_layout: bit field not allowed");
02192             }
02193           if (tp == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR)
02194             {
02195               M_assert (0, "M_lvar_layout: bit field not allowed");
02196             }
02197           size = type[i].size;
02198           align = type[i].align;
02199           mod = off % align;
02200           if (mod != 0)
02201             off += (align - mod);
02202 
02203           off += size;
02204           offset[i] = -off;
02205         }
02206 
02207       /* the local section must be max. aligned */
02208       mod = off % max_align;
02209       if (mod != 0)
02210         off += (max_align - mod);
02211       /*
02212        *  Local variables are relative to $LV
02213        */
02214       *base_macro = "$LV";
02215       return off;               /* the total size needed */
02216     }
02217   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02218     {
02219       int i, max_align, off;
02220       int size, align, mod, tp;
02221       /*
02222        *  Local variables are relative to $_local
02223        */
02224       /* 
02225        *  the LOCAL section must be max. aligned initially 
02226        */
02227       max_align = M_IMPACT_ALIGN_MAX;
02228       off = 0;
02229       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
02230         {
02231           tp = type[i].type;
02232           if (tp == M_TYPE_BIT_LONG)
02233             {
02234               M_assert (0, "M_lvar_layout: bit field not allowed");
02235             }
02236           if (tp == M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR)
02237             {
02238               M_assert (0, "M_lvar_layout: bit field not allowed");
02239             }
02240           size = type[i].size;
02241           align = type[i].align;
02242           mod = off % align;
02243           if (mod != 0)
02244             off += (align - mod);
02245           offset[i] = off;
02246           off += size;
02247         }
02248       /* the local section must be max. aligned */
02249       mod = off % max_align;
02250       if (mod != 0)
02251         off += (max_align - mod);
02252       /*
02253        *      I will use negative offsets and use $FP as the
02254        *      base address.
02255        *              $_local = $FP - $local.
02256        */
02257       *base_macro = "$FP";
02258       for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
02259         offset[i] = offset[i] - off;
02260       return off;               /* the total size needed */
02261     }
02262   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02263            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02264     {
02265       return (M_hppa_lvar_layout (n, type, offset, base_macro));
02266     }
02267   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02268            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02269     {
02270       return (M_sparc_lvar_layout (n, type, offset, base_macro));
02271     }
02272   else
02273     {
02274       M_assert (0, "M_impact_lvar_layout: illegal machine model");
02275       return (0);
02276     }
02277 
02278 }
02279 
02280 int
02281 M_impact_no_short_int (void)
02282 {
02283   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02284     {
02285       return (M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_SHORT == M_IMPACT_LCODE_SIZE_INT);
02286     }
02287   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02288     {
02289       return (M_IMPACT_SIZE_SHORT == M_IMPACT_SIZE_INT);
02290     }
02291   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02292            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02293     {
02294       return (M_hppa_no_short_int ());
02295     }
02296   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02297            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02298     {
02299       return (M_sparc_no_short_int ());
02300     }
02301   else
02302     {
02303       M_assert (0, "M_impact_no_short_int: illegal machine model");
02304       return (0);
02305     }
02306 }
02307 
02308 void
02309 M_impact_cb_label_name (char *fn, int cb, char *line, int len)
02310 {
02311   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02312     {
02313       sprintf (line, "cb%d%s", cb, fn);
02314     }
02315   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02316     {
02317       sprintf (line, "cb%d%s", cb, fn);
02318     }
02319   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02320            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02321     {
02322       M_hppa_cb_label_name (fn, cb, line, len);
02323     }
02324   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02325            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02326     {
02327       M_sparc_cb_label_name (fn, cb, line, len);
02328     }
02329   else
02330     {
02331       M_assert (0, "M_impact_cb_label_name: illegal machine model");
02332     }
02333 }
02334 
02335 int
02336 M_impact_is_cb_label (char *label, char *fn, int *cb)
02337 {
02338   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02339     {
02340       return (sscanf (label, "cb%d%s", cb, fn) == 2);
02341     }
02342   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02343     {
02344       return (sscanf (label, "cb%d%s", cb, fn) == 2);
02345     }
02346   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02347            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02348     {
02349       return (M_hppa_is_cb_label (label, fn, cb));
02350     }
02351   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02352            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02353     {
02354       return (M_sparc_is_cb_label (label, fn, cb));
02355     }
02356   else
02357     {
02358       M_assert (0, "M_impact_is_cb_label: illegal machine model");
02359       return (0);
02360     }
02361 }
02362 
02363 void
02364 M_impact_jumptbl_label_name (char *fn, int tbl_id, char *line, int len)
02365 {
02366   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02367     {
02368       sprintf (line, "_$%s%s%d", fn, M_JUMPTBL_BASE_NAME, tbl_id);
02369     }
02370   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02371     {
02372       sprintf (line, "%s%s%d", fn, M_JUMPTBL_BASE_NAME, tbl_id);
02373     }
02374   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02375            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02376     {
02377       M_hppa_jumptbl_label_name (fn, tbl_id, line, len);
02378     }
02379   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02380            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02381     {
02382       M_sparc_jumptbl_label_name (fn, tbl_id, line, len);
02383     }
02384   else
02385     {
02386       M_assert (0, "M_impact_jumptbl_label_name: illegal machine model");
02387     }
02388 }
02389 
02390 int
02391 M_impact_is_jumptbl_label (char *label, char *fn, int *tbl_id)
02392 {
02393   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02394     {
02395       char *ptr;
02396       int label_len, fn_len, base_len;
02397 
02398       /* Check the prefix */
02399       if (strncmp (label, "_$", 2))
02400         return (0);
02401 
02402       /* Some length checks, to make sure we dont step outside array */
02403       label_len = strlen (label);
02404       fn_len = strlen (fn);
02405       base_len = strlen (M_JUMPTBL_BASE_NAME);
02406       if (label_len <= (2 + fn_len + base_len))
02407         return (0);
02408 
02409       /* Check that fn is correct */
02410       ptr = label;
02411       ptr += 2;
02412       if (strncmp (ptr, fn, fn_len))
02413         return (0);
02414 
02415       /* Check that jumptbl base name is correct */
02416       ptr += fn_len;
02417       if (strncmp (ptr, M_JUMPTBL_BASE_NAME, base_len))
02418         return (0);
02419 
02420       /* Get the id */
02421       ptr += base_len;
02422       return (sscanf (ptr, "%d", tbl_id) == 1);
02423     }
02424   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02425     {
02426       /* Format for v1.0: %sM_JUMPTBL_BASE_NAME%d, where %s is the func name */
02427       char *ptr;
02428       int label_len, fn_len, base_len;
02429 
02430       /* Some length checks, to make sure we dont step outside array */
02431       label_len = strlen (label);
02432       fn_len = strlen (fn);
02433       base_len = strlen (M_JUMPTBL_BASE_NAME);
02434       if (label_len <= (fn_len + base_len))
02435         return (0);
02436 
02437       /* Check that fn is correct */
02438       ptr = label;
02439       if (strncmp (ptr, fn, fn_len))
02440         return (0);
02441 
02442       /* Check that jumptbl base name is correct */
02443       ptr += fn_len;
02444       if (strncmp (ptr, M_JUMPTBL_BASE_NAME, base_len))
02445         return (0);
02446 
02447       /* Get the id */
02448       ptr += base_len;
02449       return (sscanf (ptr, "%d", tbl_id) == 1);
02450     }
02451   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02452            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02453     {
02454       return (M_hppa_is_jumptbl_label (label, fn, tbl_id));
02455     }
02456   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02457            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02458     {
02459       return (M_sparc_is_jumptbl_label (label, fn, tbl_id));
02460     }
02461   else
02462     {
02463       M_assert (0, "M_impact_is_jumptbl_label: illegal machine model");
02464       return (0);
02465     }
02466 }
02467 
02468 int
02469 M_impact_structure_pointer (int purpose)
02470 {
02471   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02472     {
02473       return M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_ST;
02474     }
02475   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02476     {
02477       return M_IMPACT_ST;
02478     }
02479   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02480            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02481     {
02482       return (M_hppa_structure_pointer (purpose));
02483     }
02484   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02485            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02486     {
02487       return (M_sparc_structure_pointer (purpose));
02488     }
02489   else
02490     {
02491       M_assert (0, "M_impact_structure_pointer: illegal machine model");
02492       return (0);
02493     }
02494 }
02495 
02496 int
02497 M_impact_return_register (int type, int purpose)
02498 {
02499   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02500     {
02501       switch (type)
02502         {
02503         case M_TYPE_INT:
02504           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_I32;
02505         case M_TYPE_LONG:
02506           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_I32;
02507         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
02508           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_F;
02509         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
02510           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_F;
02511         default:
02512           return M_IMPACT_LCODE_RET_I32;
02513         }
02514     }
02515   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02516     {
02517       switch (type)
02518         {
02519         case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
02520           return M_IMPACT_R0_F;
02521         case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
02522           return M_IMPACT_R0_F2;
02523         default:
02524           return M_IMPACT_R0_I;
02525         }
02526     }
02527   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02528            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02529     {
02530       return (M_hppa_return_register (type, purpose));
02531     }
02532   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02533            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02534     {
02535       return (M_sparc_return_register (type, purpose));
02536     }
02537   else
02538     {
02539       M_assert (0, "M_impact_return_register: illegal machine model");
02540       return (0);
02541     }
02542 }
02543 
02544 /* Added to support Lcode model -ITI (JCG) 2/99 */
02545 char *
02546 M_impact_fn_label_name (char *label, int (*is_func) (char *is_func_label))
02547 {
02548   static char fn_label[1024];
02549 
02550   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02551     {
02552       if ((*is_func) (label))
02553         {
02554           sprintf (fn_label, "$fn_%s", label);
02555           return (fn_label);
02556         }
02557       else
02558         return (label);
02559     }
02560   else
02561     {
02562       return (label);
02563     }
02564 
02565 }
02566 
02567 char *
02568 M_impact_fn_name_from_label (char *label)
02569 {
02570   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02571     {
02572       if (!strncmp (label, "_$fn", 4))
02573         return (label + 4);
02574       else
02575         return (label);
02576     }
02577   else
02578     {
02579       return (label);
02580     }
02581 }
02582 
02583 int
02584 M_impact_fragile_macro (int macro_value)
02585 {
02586   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02587     {
02588       switch (macro_value)
02589         {
02590         case L_MAC_P12:
02591         case L_MAC_SP:
02592         case L_MAC_FP:
02593         case L_MAC_LV:          /* added SAM 10-94 */
02594         case L_MAC_IP:          /* added SAM 10-94 */
02595         case L_MAC_OP:          /* added SAM 10-94 */
02596         case L_MAC_LOCAL_SIZE:
02597         case L_MAC_PARAM_SIZE:
02598         case L_MAC_SWAP_SIZE:
02599           return 0;
02600         default:
02601           return (1);
02602         }
02603     }
02604   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02605     {
02606       switch (macro_value)
02607         {
02608         case L_MAC_SP:
02609         case L_MAC_FP:
02610         case L_MAC_LOCAL_SIZE:
02611         case L_MAC_PARAM_SIZE:
02612         case L_MAC_SWAP_SIZE:
02613           return 0;
02614         default:
02615           return 1;
02616         }
02617     }
02618   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02619            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02620     {
02621       return (M_hppa_fragile_macro (macro_value));
02622     }
02623   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02624            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02625     {
02626       return (M_sparc_fragile_macro (macro_value));
02627     }
02628   else
02629     {
02630       M_assert (0, "M_impact_return_register: illegal machine model");
02631       return (0);
02632     }
02633 }

02787       Set_impact_fragile_macro = Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_P3);

02789       Set_impact_fragile_macro = Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_P5);
02790       Set_impact_fragile_macro = Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_P6);

02802       Set_impact_fragile_macro =
02803         Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_P14);
02804       Set_impact_fragile_macro =
02805         Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_P15);
02806 
02807       Set_impact_fragile_macro =
02808         Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_TR_PTR);
02809       Set_impact_fragile_macro =
02810         Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_TR_MARK);
02811       Set_impact_fragile_macro =
02812         Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_TR_TEMP);
02813

02815         Set_add (Set_impact_fragile_macro, L_MAC_SAFE_MEM);
02816 
02817       return Set_impact_fragile_macro;
02818     }
02819   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
