02821     {
02822       return (M_hppa_fragile_macro_set ());
02823     }
02824   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02825            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02826     {
02827       return (M_sparc_fragile_macro_set ());
02828     }
02829   else
02830     {
02831       M_assert (0, "M_impact_fragile_macro_set: illegal machine model");
02832       return (0);
02833     }
02834 }
02835 
02836 int
02837 M_impact_dataflow_macro (int id)
02838 {
02839   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02840     {
02841       return ((id >= L_MAC_P0 && id <= L_MAC_P64) || (id == L_MAC_SP) ||
02842               (id == L_MAC_RETADDR) || (id >= L_MAC_LAST));
02843     }
02844   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
02845     {
02846       return ((id >= L_MAC_P0 && id <= L_MAC_P64) || (id >= L_MAC_LAST));
02847     }
02848   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02849            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02850     {
02851       return (M_hppa_dataflow_macro (id));
02852     }
02853   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
02854            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02855     {
02856       return (M_sparc_dataflow_macro (id));
02857     }
02858   else
02859     {
02860       M_assert (0, "M_impact_dataflow_macro: illegal machine model");
02861       return (0);
02862     }
02863 }
02864 
02865 
02866 /*
02867  *      This is an instruction set query, so M_IM_HP does not call HP
02868  *      Mspec function!!!
02869  *      Really??  Talk with me before changing it back - DIA
02870  *      HP-LCODE case modified to return true only for JSR, 
02871  *                                                     JSR_FS. - JWS 3/29/98
02872  */
02873 int
02874 M_impact_subroutine_call (int opc)
02875 {
02876   if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE))
02877     {
02878       /* Intentionally different than HP's. Assume have div unit, etc.
02879        * -ITI (JCT) 2/99 
02880        */
02881       return ((opc == Lop_JSR) || (opc == Lop_JSR_FS));
02882     }
02883   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1))
02884     {
02885       return ((opc == Lop_JSR) || (opc == Lop_JSR_FS));
02886     }
02887   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE)
02888     {
02889       return (M_hppa_subroutine_call (opc));
02890     }
02891   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE)
02892     {
02893       return ((opc == Lop_JSR) || (opc == Lop_JSR_FS));
02894     }
02895   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE) ||
02896            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE))
02897     {
02898       return (M_sparc_subroutine_call (opc));
02899     }
02900   else
02901     {
02902       M_assert (0, "M_impact_subroutine_call: illegal machine model");
02903       return (0);
02904     }
02905 }
02906 
02907 /*
02908  *      Impact model assumed to fully support Lcode opcodes
02909  *      This is an instruction set query, so M_IM_HP does not call HP
02910  *      Mspec function!!!
02911  */
02912 int
02913 M_oper_supported_in_arch_impact (int opc)
02914 {
02915   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02916     {
02917       /* Different from HP, assume full operation support -ITI (JCT) 2/99 */
02918       return 1;
02919     }
02920   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1) ||
02921            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
02922            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE))
02923     {
02924       return 1;
02925     }
02926   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
02927     {
02928       return (M_oper_supported_in_arch_hppa (opc));
02929     }
02930   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
02931     {
02932       return (M_oper_supported_in_arch_sparc (opc));
02933     }
02934   else
02935     {
02936       M_assert (0, "M_oper_supported_in_arch_impact: illegal machine model");
02937       return (0);
02938     }
02939 }
02940 
02941 /*
02942  *      Impact model assumed to fully support Lcode opcodes
02943  *      This is an instruction set query, so M_IM_HP does not call HP
02944  *      Mspec function!!!
02945  */
02946 int
02947 M_num_oper_required_for_impact (L_Oper * oper, char *name)
02948 {
02949   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
02950     {
02951       /* Use HPPA's biases to move labels into register's verses 
02952        * encouraging labels to be copy-propagated everywhere (which
02953        * happens if always return 1. 
02954        * May need to do further tweaking later. -ITI (JCG) 2/99
02955        */
02956 #define has_label_operand(a)    ((a->src[0]->type == L_OPERAND_LABEL)||\
02957                                  (a->src[1]->type == L_OPERAND_LABEL))
02958 
02959 #define indexed_memory_op(a)    ((a->src[0]->type == L_OPERAND_REGISTER)&&\
02960                                  (a->src[1]->type == L_OPERAND_REGISTER))
02961 
02962 #define non_zero_offset(a)      ((!((a->src[1]->type==L_OPERAND_IMMED)&&\
02963                                    ((a->src[1]->ctype&0x30)==0x00)))||\
02964                                  (a->src[1]->value.i != 0))
02965 
02966 #define short_int_inc(a,b)      ((a->src[b]->type==L_OPERAND_IMMED)&&\
02967                                  ((a->src[b]->ctype&0x30)==0x00)&&\
02968                                  (a->src[b]->value.i >= -0x10) &&\
02969                                  (a->src[b]->value.i < 0x10))
02970 #define long_pos_int_inc(a,b)   ((a->src[b]->type==L_OPERAND_IMMED)&&\
02971                                  ((a->src[b]->ctype&0x30)==0x00)&&\
02972                                  (a->src[b]->value.i > 0) && \
02973                                  (a->src[b]->value.i < 0x2000))
02974 #define long_neg_int_inc(a,b)   ((a->src[b]->type==L_OPERAND_IMMED)&&\
02975                                  ((a->src[b]->ctype&0x30)==0x00)&&\
02976                                  (a->src[b]->value.i >= -0x2000) && \
02977                                  (a->src[b]->value.i < 0))
02978 #define register_inc(a,b)        (a->src[b]->type == L_OPERAND_REGISTER)
02979       switch (oper->opc)
02980         {
02981         case Lop_ST_C:
02982         case Lop_ST_C2:
02983         case Lop_ST_I:
02984           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || has_label_operand (oper))
02985             return (2);
02986           else
02987             return (1);
02988 
02989         case Lop_LD_UC:
02990         case Lop_LD_C:
02991         case Lop_LD_UC2:
02992         case Lop_LD_C2:
02993         case Lop_LD_I:
02994           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || has_label_operand (oper))
02995             return (2);
02996           else
02997             return (1);
02998 
02999         case Lop_ST_F:
03000         case Lop_ST_F2:
03001           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || has_label_operand (oper))
03002             return (2);
03003           else
03004             return (1);
03005 
03006         case Lop_LD_F:
03007         case Lop_LD_F2:
03008           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || has_label_operand (oper))
03009             return (2);
03010           else
03011             return (1);
03012 
03013         case Lop_LD_PRE_UC:
03014         case Lop_LD_PRE_C:
03015         case Lop_LD_PRE_UC2:
03016         case Lop_LD_PRE_C2:
03017         case Lop_LD_PRE_I:
03018           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || non_zero_offset (oper))
03019             return (2);
03020           else if (short_int_inc (oper, 2) || long_neg_int_inc (oper, 2))
03021             return (1);
03022           else
03023             return (2);
03024 
03025         case Lop_ST_PRE_C:
03026         case Lop_ST_PRE_C2:
03027         case Lop_ST_PRE_I:
03028           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || non_zero_offset (oper))
03029             return (2);
03030           else if (short_int_inc (oper, 3) || long_neg_int_inc (oper, 3))
03031             return (1);
03032           else
03033             return (2);
03034 
03035         case Lop_LD_POST_UC:
03036         case Lop_LD_POST_C:
03037         case Lop_LD_POST_UC2:
03038         case Lop_LD_POST_C2:
03039         case Lop_LD_POST_I:
03040           if (non_zero_offset (oper))
03041             return (2);
03042           else if (short_int_inc (oper, 2) ||
03043                    long_pos_int_inc (oper, 2) || register_inc (oper, 2))
03044             return (1);
03045           else
03046             return (2);
03047 
03048         case Lop_ST_POST_C:
03049         case Lop_ST_POST_C2:
03050         case Lop_ST_POST_I:
03051           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || non_zero_offset (oper))
03052             return (2);
03053           else if (short_int_inc (oper, 3) || long_pos_int_inc (oper, 3))
03054             return (1);
03055           else
03056             return (2);
03057 
03058         case Lop_LD_PRE_F:
03059         case Lop_LD_PRE_F2:
03060           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || non_zero_offset (oper))
03061             return (2);
03062           else if (short_int_inc (oper, 2))
03063             return (1);
03064           else
03065             return (2);
03066 
03067         case Lop_ST_PRE_F:
03068         case Lop_ST_PRE_F2:
03069           if (indexed_memory_op (oper) || non_zero_offset (oper))
03070             return (2);
03071           else if (short_int_inc (oper, 3))
03072             return (1);
03073           else
03074             return (2);
03075 
03076         case Lop_LD_POST_F:
03077         case Lop_LD_POST_F2:
03078           if (non_zero_offset (oper))
03079             return (2);
03080           else if (short_int_inc (oper, 2) || register_inc (oper, 2))
03081             return (1);
03082           else
03083             return (2);
03084 
03085         case Lop_ST_POST_F:
03086         case Lop_ST_POST_F2:
03087           if (non_zero_offset (oper))
03088             return (2);
03089           else if (short_int_inc (oper, 3) || register_inc (oper, 3))
03090             return (1);
03091           else
03092             return (2);
03093 
03094         case Lop_PREF_LD:
03095           if (has_label_operand (oper))
03096             return (2);
03097           else
03098             return (1);
03099 
03100         default:
03101           return (1);
03102         }
03103     }
03104   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1) ||
03105            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
03106            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE))
03107     {
03108       return 1;
03109     }
03110   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
03111     {
03112       return (M_num_oper_required_for_hppa (oper, name));
03113     }
03114   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
03115     {
03116       return (M_num_oper_required_for_sparc (oper, name));
03117     }
03118   else
03119     {
03120       M_assert (0, "M_num_oper_required_for_impact: illegal machine model");
03121       return (0);
03122     }
03123 }
03124 
03125 int
03126 M_is_stack_operand_impact (L_Operand * operand)
03127 {
03128   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
03129     {
03130       if (L_is_macro (operand) &&
03131           (operand->value.mac == L_MAC_SP ||
03132            operand->value.mac == L_MAC_FP ||
03133            operand->value.mac == L_MAC_SAFE_MEM ||
03134            operand->value.mac == L_MAC_P12 ||
03135            operand->value.mac == L_MAC_IP ||
03136            operand->value.mac == L_MAC_OP ||
03137            operand->value.mac == L_MAC_RS || operand->value.mac == L_MAC_LV))
03138         {
03139           return (1);
03140         }
03141       else
03142         {
03143           return (0);
03144         }
03145     }
03146   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
03147     {
03148       if (L_is_macro (operand) &&
03149           (operand->value.mac == L_MAC_SP || operand->value.mac == L_MAC_FP))
03150         return (1);
03151       return (0);
03152     }
03153   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
03154            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
03155     {
03156       return (M_is_stack_operand_hppa (operand));
03157     }
03158   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
03159            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
03160     {
03161       return (M_is_stack_operand_sparc (operand));
03162     }
03163   else
03164     {
03165       M_assert (0, "M_is_stack_operand_impact: illegal machine model");
03166       return (0);
03167     }
03168 }
03169 
03170 int
03171 M_is_unsafe_macro_impact (L_Operand * operand)
03172 {
03173   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
03174     {
03175       return 0;
03176     }
03177   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
03178     {
03179       return 0;
03180     }
03181   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
03182            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
03183     {
03184       return (M_is_unsafe_macro_hppa (operand));
03185     }
03186   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
03187            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
03188     {
03189       return (M_is_unsafe_macro_sparc (operand));
03190     }
03191   else
03192     {
03193       M_assert (0, "M_is_unsafe_macro_impact: illegal machine model");
03194       return (0);
03195     }
03196 }
03197 
03198 static int
03199 M_operand_type_impact_lcode (L_Operand * operand)
03200 {
03201   /* If NULL operand pointer, then return MDES_OPERAND_NULL */
03202   if (operand == NULL)
03203     return (MDES_OPERAND_NULL);
03204 
03205   switch (L_operand_case_type (operand))
03206     {
03207     case L_OPERAND_INT:
03208     case L_OPERAND_FLOAT:
03209     case L_OPERAND_DOUBLE:
03210       return (MDES_OPERAND_Lit);
03211 
03212     case L_OPERAND_MACRO:
03213     case L_OPERAND_REGISTER:
03214       if (L_is_ctype_predicate (operand))
03215         return (MDES_OPERAND_p);
03216       else
03217         return (MDES_OPERAND_REG);
03218 
03219     case L_OPERAND_CB:
03220     case L_OPERAND_LABEL:
03221     case L_OPERAND_STRING:
03222       return (MDES_OPERAND_Label);
03223 
03224     default:
03225       M_assert (0, "M_operand_type_impact_lcode: Unknown type");
03226       return (0);
03227     }
03228 }
03229 
03230 static int
03231 M_operand_type_impact_hp_lcode (L_Operand * operand)
03232 {
03233   /* If NULL operand pointer, then return MDES_OPERAND_NULL */
03234   if (operand == NULL)
03235     return (MDES_OPERAND_NULL);
03236 
03237   switch (L_operand_case_type (operand))
03238     {
03239     case L_OPERAND_INT:
03240       if (FIELD_5 (operand->value.i))
03241         return (MDES_OPERAND_Lit5);
03242       else if (FIELD_11 (operand->value.i))
03243         return (MDES_OPERAND_Lit11);
03244       else if (FIELD_14 (operand->value.i))
03245         return (MDES_OPERAND_Lit14);
03246       else
03247         return (MDES_OPERAND_Lit21);
03248 
03249     case L_OPERAND_MACRO:
03250     case L_OPERAND_REGISTER:
03251       if (L_is_ctype_predicate (operand))
03252         return (MDES_OPERAND_p);
03253       else
03254         return (MDES_OPERAND_REG);
03255 
03256     case L_OPERAND_CB:
03257     case L_OPERAND_LABEL:
03258     case L_OPERAND_FLOAT:
03259     case L_OPERAND_DOUBLE:
03260     case L_OPERAND_STRING:
03261       return (MDES_OPERAND_Label);
03262 
03263     default:
03264       M_assert (0, "M_operand_type_impact_hp_lcode: Unknown type");
03265       return (0);
03266     }
03267 }
03268 
03269 static int
03270 M_operand_type_impact_sparc_lcode (L_Operand * operand)
03271 {
03272   /* If NULL operand pointer, then return MDES_OPERAND_NULL */
03273   if (operand == NULL)
03274     return (MDES_OPERAND_NULL);
03275 
03276   switch (L_operand_case_type (operand))
03277     {
03278     case L_OPERAND_INT:
03279       return (MDES_OPERAND_Lit);
03280 
03281     case L_OPERAND_MACRO:
03282       if (operand->value.mac >= L_SPARC_MAC_ICC &&
03283           operand->value.mac <= L_SPARC_MAC_ICC15)
03284         return (MDES_OPERAND_sparc_icc);
03285       else if (operand->value.mac >= L_SPARC_MAC_FCC &&
03286                operand->value.mac <= L_SPARC_MAC_FCC15)
03287         return (MDES_OPERAND_sparc_fcc);
03288       else
03289         return (MDES_OPERAND_REG);
03290 
03291     case L_OPERAND_REGISTER:
03292       return (MDES_OPERAND_REG);
03293 
03294     case L_OPERAND_CB:
03295     case L_OPERAND_LABEL:
03296     case L_OPERAND_FLOAT:
03297     case L_OPERAND_DOUBLE:
03298     case L_OPERAND_STRING:
03299       return (MDES_OPERAND_Label);
03300 
03301     default:
03302       M_assert (0, "M_operand_type_impact_sparc_lcode: Unknown type");
03303       return (0);
03304     }
03305 
03306 }
03307 
03308 int
03309 M_operand_type_impact (L_Operand * operand)
03310 {
03311   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
03312     {
03313       return M_operand_type_impact_lcode (operand);
03314     }
03315   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1) ||
03316            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
03317            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE))
03318     {
03319       return M_operand_type_impact_lcode (operand);
03320     }
03321   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
03322     {
03323       return M_operand_type_impact_hp_lcode (operand);
03324     }
03325   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
03326     {
03327       return M_operand_type_impact_sparc_lcode (operand);
03328     }
03329   else
03330     {
03331       M_assert (0, "M_operand_type_impact: illegal machine model");
03332       return (0);
03333     }
03334 }
03335 
03336 
03337 /* Mechanism for Limpact to specify the offset between the left float
03338  * register numer and the double register number.  Typically, this
03339  * offset should be set to num_flt_callee_reg in Limpact. -JCG 6/99
03340  */
03341 int M_Limpact_dbl_offset = 0;
03342 
03343 /* Conflicting operand functions for impact ver1 and hppa models */
03344 /*
03345  *      Structure of assumed register file for IMPACT machine, so this
03346  *      is what is used after register allocation for the IMPACT machine
03347  *
03348  *      int registers
03349  *              1
03350  *              ...
03351  *              Limpact_num_int_reg (required to be an even #)
03352  *
03353  *      flt/dbl registers (double == consecective float regs)
03354  *      (double reg number is left float + M_Limpact_dbl_offset -JCG 6/99)
03355  *              Limpact_num_int_reg+1   Limpact_num_int_reg+2
03356  *              ...                     ...
03357  *              Limpact_num_flt_reg+M_Limpact_dbl_offset-1   
03358  *              Limpact_num_flt_reg+M_Limpact_dbl_offset
03359  *      Note: Doubles use only odd register numbers after allocation! -JCG 6/99
03360  *
03361  *      prd registrs
03362  *              Limpact_num_flt_reg
03363  *              ...
03364  *              Limpact_num_prd_reg
03365  *
03366  *      Return registers:
03367  *              P0 (int), P2 (dbl) (no flt and prd parameter passing regs)
03368  *              --> actually P1 is flt, but should never see!!!
03369  *
03370  *      Parameter passing
03371  *              P4-P7 (int), P12-P15(dbl) 
03372  *              (no flt and prd parameter passing regs)
03373  *              --> actually P8-P11 is flt, but should never see!!!
03374  *
03375  *      Stack ptr, Frame ptr
03376  *              SP, FP
03377  *
03378  *      Note for now, handle all macros so can run Limpact on all Lcodes
03379  *      for any target machine.
03380  */
03381 
03382  
03383 static int
03384 M_conflicting_operands_impact_lcode (L_Operand * operand,
03385                                      L_Operand ** conflict_array, int len,
03386                                      int prepass)
03387 {
03388   int i = 0;
03389 
03390   /* Use this case if no register allocation has been done on the code!! */
03391   if (prepass)
03392     {
03393       if (L_is_reg (operand))
03394         {
03395           conflict_array[i++] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03396         }
03397       else if (L_is_macro (operand))
03398         {
03399           conflict_array[i++] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03400         }
03401       else
03402         {
03403           M_assert (0,
03404                     "Limpact_conflicting_operands: illegal operand type "
03405                     "(no regalloc)");
03406         }
03407     }
03408 
03409   /* else register allocation has been done */
03410   else if (L_is_reg (operand))
03411     {
03412       /* int register */
03413       if (L_is_ctype_integer (operand))
03414         {
03415           conflict_array[i++] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03416         }
03417       /* Made match Limpact's register bank definitions -JCG 6/99 */
03418       else if (L_is_ctype_dbl (operand))
03419         {
03420           /* Sanity check, double register operand number must be odd
03421            * after register allocation!
03422            */
03423           if ((operand->value.r & 0x1) == 0)
03424             {
03425               M_assert (0,
03426                         "Limpact_conflicting_operands: "
03427                         "illegal even double regsiter after regalloc!");
03428             }
03429 
03430           /* Set up conflicting double register */
03431           conflict_array[i++] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03432 
03433           /* Set up conflicting float registers. */
03434           /* Left float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset  = double reg # */
03435           conflict_array[i] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03436           conflict_array[i]->ctype = L_CTYPE_FLOAT;
03437           conflict_array[i++]->value.r =
03438             operand->value.r - M_Limpact_dbl_offset;
03439 
03440           /* Right float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1 = double reg # */
03441           conflict_array[i] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03442           conflict_array[i]->ctype = L_CTYPE_FLOAT;
03443           conflict_array[i++]->value.r =
03444             (operand->value.r - M_Limpact_dbl_offset) + 1;
03445 
03446 #if 0
03447           /* Debug */
03448           fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03449           L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03450           fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03451           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03452           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03453           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[2], 1);
03454           fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03455 #endif
03456         }
03457       /* Made match Limpact's register bank definitions -JCG 6/99 */
03458       else if (L_is_ctype_flt (operand))
03459         {
03460           /* If left register */
03461           if (operand->value.r & 0x1)
03462             {
03463               /* Set up conflicting float register */
03464               conflict_array[i++] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03465 
03466               /* Set up conflicting double register */
03467               /* Left float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset  = double reg # */
03468               conflict_array[i] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03469               conflict_array[i]->ctype = L_CTYPE_DOUBLE;
03470               conflict_array[i++]->value.r =
03471                 operand->value.r + M_Limpact_dbl_offset;
03472 
03473 #if 0
03474               /* Debug */
03475               fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03476               L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03477               fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03478               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03479               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03480               fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03481 #endif
03482             }
03483           else
03484             {
03485               /* Set up conflicting float register */
03486               conflict_array[i++] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03487 
03488               /* Set up conflicting double register */
03489               /* Right float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1 =double reg # */
03490               conflict_array[i] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03491               conflict_array[i]->ctype = L_CTYPE_DOUBLE;
03492               conflict_array[i++]->value.r =
03493                 operand->value.r + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1;
03494 
03495 #if 0
03496               /* Debug */
03497               fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03498               L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03499               fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03500               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03501               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03502               fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03503 #endif
03504             }
03505         }
03506 #if 1
03507       else if (L_MAC_PRED_ALL)
03508         {
03509           int j, num_preds, pred_base;
03510 
03511           conflict_array[i++] =
03512             L_new_macro_operand (L_MAC_PRED_ALL, L_CTYPE_PREDICATE,
03513                                  L_PTYPE_NULL);
03514 
03515           num_preds = Mspec_num_prd_callee_reg;
03516           pred_base = (Mspec_num_int_caller_reg +
03517                        Mspec_num_int_callee_reg + 
03518                        Mspec_num_flt_caller_reg*2 +
03519                        Mspec_num_flt_callee_reg*2);
03520           for (j = 0; j < num_preds; j++)
03521             {
03522               conflict_array[i++] =
03523                 L_new_register_operand (pred_base + j,
03524                                         L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, 
03525                                         L_PTYPE_NULL);
03526             }
03527         }
03528 #endif
03529       /* pred register */
03530       else if (L_is_ctype_predicate (operand))
03531         {
03532           conflict_array[i++] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03533 #if 1
03534           conflict_array[i++] = L_new_macro_operand (L_MAC_PRED_ALL, 
03535                                                      L_CTYPE_PREDICATE,
03536                                                      L_PTYPE_NULL);
03537 #endif
03538         }
03539       else
03540         {
03541           M_assert (0, "Limpact_conflicting_operands: illegal reg number");
03542         }
03543     }
03544   else if (L_is_macro (operand))
03545     {
03546       conflict_array[i++] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03547     }
03548   else
03549     {
03550       printf("%d %d\n",i,len);
03551       M_assert (0, "M_conflicting_operands_impact_lcode: unsupported operand\n");
03552     }
03553 
03554   if (i > len)
03555     {
03556       printf("%d %d\n",i,len);
03557       M_assert (0,"M_conflicting_operands_impact_lcode: too many conflicts\n");
03558     }
03559 
03560   return (i);
03561 }
03562 
03563 
03564 /*
03565  *      This file is essentially a combination of the impact_lcode version
03566  *      and the hppa version (from m_hppa.c) for the Lhppa macros
03567  */
03568 static int
03569 M_conflicting_operands_impact_hp_lcode (L_Operand * operand,
03570                                         L_Operand ** conflict_array, int len,
03571                                         int prepass)
03572 {
03573   int right, left;
03574 
03575   if (prepass && (!L_is_macro (operand)))
03576     {
03577       conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03578       return (1);
03579     }
03580   if (L_is_macro (operand))
03581     {
03582       switch (operand->value.mac)
03583         {
03584         case L_MAC_SP:
03585         case HPPA_MAC_TRUE_SP:
03586         case L_MAC_SAFE_MEM:
03587           conflict_array[0] =
03588             L_new_macro_operand (L_MAC_SP, L_CTYPE_INT, L_PTYPE_NULL);
03589           conflict_array[1] =
03590             L_new_macro_operand (HPPA_MAC_TRUE_SP, L_CTYPE_INT, L_PTYPE_NULL);
03591           conflict_array[2] =
03592             L_new_macro_operand (L_MAC_SAFE_MEM, L_CTYPE_INT, L_PTYPE_NULL);
03593           return (3);
03594         case L_MAC_P4:
03595         case L_MAC_P5:
03596         case L_MAC_P6:
03597         case L_MAC_P7:
03598           left = operand->value.mac;
03599           right = left + 4;
03600           break;
03601         case L_MAC_P8:
03602         case L_MAC_P9:
03603         case L_MAC_P10:
03604         case L_MAC_P11:
03605           right = operand->value.mac;
03606           left = right - 4;
03607           break;
03608         default:
03609           conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03610           return (1);
03611         }
03612     }
03613   else if (L_is_reg (operand))
03614     {
03615       /* int register */
03616       if (L_is_ctype_integer (operand))
03617         {
03618           conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03619           return (1);
03620         }
03621       /* Made match Limpact's register bank definitions -JCG 6/99 */
03622       else if (L_is_ctype_dbl (operand))
03623         {
03624           /* Sanity check, double register operand number must be odd
03625            * after register allocation!
03626            */
03627           if ((operand->value.r & 0x1) == 0)
03628             {
03629               M_assert (0,
03630                         "Limpact_conflicting_operands: "
03631                         "illegal even double regsiter after regalloc!");
03632               return (0);
03633             }
03634 
03635           /* Set up conflicting double register */
03636           conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03637 
03638           /* Set up conflicting float registers. */
03639           /* Left float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset  = double reg # */
03640           conflict_array[1] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03641           conflict_array[1]->ctype = L_CTYPE_FLOAT;
03642           conflict_array[1]->value.r =
03643             operand->value.r - M_Limpact_dbl_offset;
03644 
03645           /* Right float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1 = double reg # */
03646           conflict_array[2] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03647           conflict_array[2]->ctype = L_CTYPE_FLOAT;
03648           conflict_array[2]->value.r =
03649             (operand->value.r - M_Limpact_dbl_offset) + 1;
03650 
03651 #if 0
03652           /* Debug */
03653           fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03654           L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03655           fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03656           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03657           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03658           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[2], 1);
03659           fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03660 #endif
03661           return (3);
03662         }
03663       /* Made match Limpact's register bank definitions -JCG 6/99 */
03664       else if (L_is_ctype_flt (operand))
03665         {
03666           /* If left register */
03667           if (operand->value.r & 0x1)
03668             {
03669               /* Set up conflicting float register */
03670               conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03671 
03672               /* Set up conflicting double register */
03673               /* Left float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset  = double reg # */
03674               conflict_array[1] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03675               conflict_array[1]->ctype = L_CTYPE_DOUBLE;
03676               conflict_array[1]->value.r =
03677                 operand->value.r + M_Limpact_dbl_offset;
03678 
03679 #if 0
03680               /* Debug */
03681               fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03682               L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03683               fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03684               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03685               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03686               fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03687 #endif
03688 
03689               return (2);
03690             }
03691           else
03692             {
03693               /* Set up conflicting float register */
03694               conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03695 
03696               /* Set up conflicting double register */
03697               /* Right float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1 =double reg # */
03698               conflict_array[1] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03699               conflict_array[1]->ctype = L_CTYPE_DOUBLE;
03700               conflict_array[1]->value.r =
03701                 operand->value.r + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1;
03702 
03703 #if 0
03704               /* Debug */
03705               fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03706               L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03707               fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03708               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03709               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03710               fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03711 #endif
03712 
03713               return (2);
03714             }
03715         }
03716       /* pred register */
03717       else if (L_is_ctype_predicate (operand))
03718         {
03719           conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03720           return (1);
03721         }
03722       else
03723         {
03724           M_assert (0, "Limpact_conflicting_operands: illegal reg number");
03725           return (0);
03726         }
03727     }
03728   else
03729     {
03730       M_assert (0, "Limpact_conflicting_operands: unsupported operand type");
03731       return (0);
03732     }
03733 
03734   M_assert (0,
03735             "M_conflicting_operands_impact_hp_lcode: "
03736             "unsupported operand type");
03737   return (0);
03738 
03739 }
03740 
03741 /*
03742  *      This file is essentially a combination of the impact_lcode version
03743  *      and the sparc version (from m_sparc.c) for the Lsparc macros
03744  */
03745 static int
03746 M_conflicting_operands_impact_sparc_lcode (L_Operand * operand,
03747                                            L_Operand ** conflict_array,
03748                                            int len, int prepass)
03749 {
03750   if (prepass && (!L_is_macro (operand)))
03751     {
03752       conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03753       return (1);
03754     }
03755   if (L_is_macro (operand))
03756     {
03757       switch (operand->value.mac)
03758         {
03759         default:
03760           conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03761           return (1);
03762         }
03763     }
03764   else if (L_is_reg (operand))
03765     {
03766       /* int register */
03767       if (L_is_ctype_integer (operand))
03768         {
03769           conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03770           return (1);
03771         }
03772       /* Made match Limpact's register bank definitions -JCG 6/99 */
03773       else if (L_is_ctype_dbl (operand))
03774         {
03775           /* Sanity check, double register operand number must be odd
03776            * after register allocation!
03777            */
03778           if ((operand->value.r & 0x1) == 0)
03779             {
03780               M_assert (0,
03781                         "Limpact_conflicting_operands: "
03782                         "illegal even double regsiter after regalloc!");
03783               return (0);
03784             }
03785 
03786           /* Set up conflicting double register */
03787           conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03788 
03789           /* Set up conflicting float registers. */
03790           /* Left float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset  = double reg # */
03791           conflict_array[1] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03792           conflict_array[1]->ctype = L_CTYPE_FLOAT;
03793           conflict_array[1]->value.r =
03794             operand->value.r - M_Limpact_dbl_offset;
03795 
03796           /* Right float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1 = double reg # */
03797           conflict_array[2] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03798           conflict_array[2]->ctype = L_CTYPE_FLOAT;
03799           conflict_array[2]->value.r =
03800             (operand->value.r - M_Limpact_dbl_offset) + 1;
03801 
03802 #if 0
03803           /* Debug */
03804           fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03805           L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03806           fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03807           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03808           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03809           L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[2], 1);
03810           fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03811 #endif
03812           return (3);
03813         }
03814       /* Made match Limpact's register bank definitions -JCG 6/99 */
03815       else if (L_is_ctype_flt (operand))
03816         {
03817           /* If left register */
03818           if (operand->value.r & 0x1)
03819             {
03820               /* Set up conflicting float register */
03821               conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03822 
03823               /* Set up conflicting double register */
03824               /* Left float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset  = double reg # */
03825               conflict_array[1] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03826               conflict_array[1]->ctype = L_CTYPE_DOUBLE;
03827               conflict_array[1]->value.r =
03828                 operand->value.r + M_Limpact_dbl_offset;
03829 
03830 #if 0
03831               /* Debug */
03832               fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03833               L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03834               fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03835               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03836               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03837               fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03838 #endif
03839 
03840               return (2);
03841             }
03842           else
03843             {
03844               /* Set up conflicting float register */
03845               conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03846 
03847               /* Set up conflicting double register */
03848               /* Right float reg # + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1 =double reg # */
03849               conflict_array[1] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03850               conflict_array[1]->ctype = L_CTYPE_DOUBLE;
03851               conflict_array[1]->value.r =
03852                 operand->value.r + M_Limpact_dbl_offset - 1;
03853 
03854 #if 0
03855               /* Debug */
03856               fprintf (stderr, "For operand: ");
03857               L_print_operand (stderr, operand, 1);
03858               fprintf (stderr, "\nConflict array: ");
03859               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[0], 1);
03860               L_print_operand (stderr, conflict_array[1], 1);
03861               fprintf (stderr, "\n\n");
03862 #endif
03863 
03864               return (2);
03865             }
03866         }
03867       /* pred register */
03868       else if (L_is_ctype_predicate (operand))
03869         {
03870           conflict_array[0] = L_copy_operand (operand);
03871           return (1);
03872         }
03873       else
03874         {
03875           M_assert (0,
03876                     "M_conflicting_operands_impact_sparc_lcode: "
03877                     "illegal reg number");
03878           return (0);
03879         }
03880     }
03881 
03882   M_assert (0,
03883             "M_conflicting_operands_impact_sparc_lcode: "
03884             "unsupported operand type");
03885   return (0);
03886 }
03887 
03888 int
03889 M_conflicting_operands_impact (L_Operand * operand,
03890                                L_Operand ** conflict_array, int len,
03891                                int prepass)
03892 {
03893   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
03894     {
03895       return M_conflicting_operands_impact_lcode (operand,
03896                                                   conflict_array, len,
03897                                                   prepass);
03898     }
03899   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
03900     {
03901       return M_conflicting_operands_impact_lcode (operand,
03902                                                   conflict_array, len,
03903                                                   prepass);
03904     }
03905   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
03906            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
03907     {
03908       return M_conflicting_operands_impact_hp_lcode (operand,
03909                                                      conflict_array, len,
03910                                                      prepass);
03911     }
03912   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
03913            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
03914     {
03915       return M_conflicting_operands_impact_sparc_lcode (operand,
03916                                                         conflict_array, len,
03917                                                         prepass);
03918     }
03919   else
03920     {
03921       M_assert (0, "M_conflicting_operands_impact: illegal machine model");
03922       return (0);
03923     }
03924 
03925 }
03926 
03927 void
03928 M_define_macros_impact (STRING_Symbol_Table * sym_tbl)
03929 {
03930   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
03931     {
03932       return;
03933     }
03934   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
03935     {
03936       return;
03937     }
03938   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
03939            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
03940     {
03941       M_define_macros_hppa (sym_tbl);
03942     }
03943   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
03944            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
03945     {
03946       M_define_macros_sparc (sym_tbl);
03947     }
03948   else
03949     {
03950       M_assert (0, "M_define_macros_impact: illegal machine model");
03951     }
03952 }
03953 
03954 char *
03955 M_get_macro_name_impact (int id)
03956 {
03957 
03958   if (M_impact_model == M_IM_LCODE)
03959     {
03960       return "?";
03961     }
03962   else if (M_impact_model == M_IM_VER_1)
03963     {
03964       return "?";
03965     }
03966   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_LCODE) ||
03967            (M_impact_model == M_IM_HP_MCODE))
03968     {
03969       return (M_get_macro_name_hppa (id));
03970     }
03971   else if ((M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_LCODE) ||
03972            (M_impact_model == M_IM_SPARC_MCODE))
03973     {
03974       return (M_get_macro_name_sparc (id));
03975     }
03976   else
03977     {
03978       M_assert (0, "M_get_macro_name_impact: illegal machine model");
03979       return (NULL);
03980     }
03981 }
03982 
03983 int
03984 M_num_registers_impact (int ctype)
03985 {
03986   switch (ctype)
03987     {
03988     case L_CTYPE_INT:
03989       return (64);
03990     case L_CTYPE_FLOAT:
03991       return (64);
03992     case L_CTYPE_DOUBLE:
03993       return (32);
03994     case L_CTYPE_PREDICATE:
03995       return (64);
03996     default:
03997       return (0);
03998     }
03999 }
